018package com.scivicslab.actoriac.report;
019
020import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.core.Action;
021import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.core.ActionResult;
022import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.core.JsonState;
023import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.workflow.IIActorRef;
024import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.workflow.IIActorSystem;
025
026import org.json.JSONObject;
027import org.yaml.snakeyaml.Yaml;
028
029import java.io.InputStream;
030import java.nio.file.Files;
031import java.nio.file.Path;
032import java.nio.file.Paths;
033import java.util.Map;
034import java.util.logging.Logger;
035
036/**
037 * Actor for building and outputting workflow reports.
038 *
039 * <p>This actor wraps a {@link ReportBuilder} POJO and provides workflow-callable
040 * actions via {@code @Action} annotations. It handles the integration with the
041 * actor system, database, and output multiplexer.</p>
042 *
043 * <h2>Actions:</h2>
044 * <ul>
045 *   <li>{@code addWorkflowInfo} - Add workflow metadata section</li>
046 *   <li>{@code addJsonStateSection} - Add actor's JsonState as YAML</li>
047 *   <li>{@code report} - Build and output the report</li>
048 * </ul>
049 *
050 * <p>Transition履歴の詳細表示は{@code TransitionViewerPlugin}で行う。</p>
051 *
052 * @author devteam@scivicslab.com
053 * @since 2.15.0
054 */
055public class ReportBuilderIIAR extends IIActorRef<ReportBuilder> {
056
057    private static final String CLASS_NAME = ReportBuilderIIAR.class.getName();
058    private static final Logger logger = Logger.getLogger(CLASS_NAME);
059
060    /**
061     * Constructs a new ReportBuilderIIAR.
062     *
063     * @param name the actor name
064     * @param builder the ReportBuilder POJO to wrap
065     */
066    public ReportBuilderIIAR(String name, ReportBuilder builder) {
067        super(name, builder);
068    }
069
070    /**
071     * Constructs a new ReportBuilderIIAR with actor system.
072     *
073     * @param name the actor name
074     * @param builder the ReportBuilder POJO to wrap
075     * @param system the actor system
076     */
077    public ReportBuilderIIAR(String name, ReportBuilder builder, IIActorSystem system) {
078        super(name, builder, system);
079    }
080
081    // ========================================================================
082    // Actions
083    // ========================================================================
084
085    /**
086     * Adds workflow info section.
087     *
088     * <p>Gets workflow path from nodeGroup, reads the YAML file to extract
089     * name and description, and adds a WorkflowInfoSection to the report.</p>
090     *
091     * @param args unused
092     * @return ActionResult indicating success or failure
093     */
094    @Action("addWorkflowInfo")
095    public ActionResult addWorkflowInfo(String args) {
096        logger.info("ReportBuilderIIAR.addWorkflowInfo");
097
098        String workflowPath = getWorkflowPathFromNodeGroup();
099        if (workflowPath == null) {
100            return new ActionResult(false, "Could not get workflow path from nodeGroup");
101        }
102
103        String name = null;
104        String description = null;
105
106        // Try to read workflow YAML for name and description
107        try {
108            Path path = Paths.get(workflowPath);
109            if (!Files.exists(path)) {
110                path = Paths.get(System.getProperty("user.dir"), workflowPath);
111            }
112
113            if (Files.exists(path)) {
114                try (InputStream is = Files.newInputStream(path)) {
115                    Yaml yaml = new Yaml();
116                    Map<String, Object> data = yaml.load(is);
117                    if (data != null) {
118                        name = (String) data.get("name");
119                        Object descObj = data.get("description");
120                        description = descObj != null ? descObj.toString().trim() : null;
121                    }
122                }
123            }
124        } catch (Exception e) {
125            logger.warning("ReportBuilderIIAR.addWorkflowInfo: Could not read workflow file: " + e.getMessage());
126        }
127
128        this.object.addSection(new WorkflowInfoSection(workflowPath, name, description));
129        return new ActionResult(true, "Workflow info section added");
130    }
131
132    /**
133     * Adds JsonState section for specified actor.
134     *
135     * <p>Arguments (JSON):</p>
136     * <ul>
137     *   <li>{@code actor} - Actor name (required)</li>
138     *   <li>{@code path} - JsonState path filter (optional)</li>
139     * </ul>
140     *
141     * @param args JSON arguments
142     * @return ActionResult indicating success or failure
143     */
144    @Action("addJsonStateSection")
145    public ActionResult addJsonStateSection(String args) {
146        logger.info("ReportBuilderIIAR.addJsonStateSection: args=" + args);
147
148        String actorName;
149        String path = "";
150
151        try {
152            JSONObject json = new JSONObject(args);
153            actorName = json.getString("actor");
154            path = json.optString("path", "");
155        } catch (Exception e) {
156            return new ActionResult(false, "Invalid arguments: " + e.getMessage());
157        }
158
159        if (system() == null) {
160            return new ActionResult(false, "ActorSystem not available");
161        }
162
163        IIActorRef<?> targetActor = ((IIActorSystem) system()).getIIActor(actorName);
164        if (targetActor == null) {
165            return new ActionResult(false, "Actor not found: " + actorName);
166        }
167
168        JsonState jsonState = targetActor.json();
169        if (jsonState == null) {
170            return new ActionResult(false, "Actor has no JsonState: " + actorName);
171        }
172
173        String yamlContent = jsonState.toStringOfYaml(path);
174        this.object.addSection(new JsonStateSection(actorName, yamlContent));
175
176        return new ActionResult(true, "JsonState section added for " + actorName);
177    }
178
179    /**
180     * Builds and outputs the report.
181     *
182     * @param args unused
183     * @return ActionResult with the report content
184     */
185    @Action("report")
186    public ActionResult report(String args) {
187        logger.info("ReportBuilderIIAR.report");
188
189        String reportContent = this.object.build();
190        reportToMultiplexer(reportContent);
191
192        return new ActionResult(true, reportContent);
193    }
194
195    // ========================================================================
196    // Helper Methods
197    // ========================================================================
198
199    /**
200     * Gets workflow path from nodeGroup actor.
201     */
202    private String getWorkflowPathFromNodeGroup() {
203        if (system() == null) return null;
204        IIActorSystem iiSystem = (IIActorSystem) system();
205
206        IIActorRef<?> nodeGroup = iiSystem.getIIActor("nodeGroup");
207        if (nodeGroup == null) return null;
208
209        ActionResult result = nodeGroup.callByActionName("getWorkflowPath", "");
210        return result.isSuccess() ? result.getResult() : null;
211    }
212
213    /**
214     * Outputs report to outputMultiplexer.
215     */
216    private void reportToMultiplexer(String data) {
217        if (system() == null) return;
218        IIActorSystem iiSystem = (IIActorSystem) system();
219
220        IIActorRef<?> multiplexer = iiSystem.getIIActor("outputMultiplexer");
221        if (multiplexer == null) return;
222
223        JSONObject arg = new JSONObject();
224        arg.put("source", "report-builder");
225        arg.put("type", "plugin-result");
226        arg.put("data", data);
227        multiplexer.callByActionName("add", arg.toString());
228    }
229}
